        computeHighlightingAndNavigationContext(Editor, PsiFile, int)

      • computeHighlightingAndNavigationContext

        public static BraceMatchingUtil.BraceHighlightingAndNavigationContext computeHighlightingAndNavigationContext(Editor editor,
                                                                                                              PsiFile file,
                                                                                                              int offset)
        Computes context that should be used to highlight and navigate matching braces
        Parameters:
        offset - offset we are computing for. Some implementations may need to compute this not only for caret position, but for other offsets, e.g. skipping spaces behind or ahead.
        Returns:
        a context should be used or null if there is no matching braces at offset
